茳字的基本解释

茳
jiāng
〔茳蓠〕一种藻类植物。亦作“江蓠”。
〔茳芏〕多年生草木植物，茎三棱形，叶细长，开绿褐色小花，茎可编席。

茳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》古雙切，平江，見。］
见“茳芏”、“茳蘺”。

茳字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1029第01
【唐韻】古雙切，音江。【玉篇】茳蘺，香艸。

茳字的源字形

茳字的起名意思

多年生草本，茎呈三棱形，叶退化呈鞘状，夏季开绿褐色小花。茎可编蓆。

茳
Basic explanation of words
茳
jiāng
〔茳蓠〕A kind of algae. Also known as "Gracilaria".
〔茳芏〕perennial vegetation, stems are triangular, slender leaves, green-brown flowers, stems can be matted.
茳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Guangyun" ancient double cut, Pingjiang, see you. ]
See "茳芏", "茳蓠".
茳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　茳; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1029 01
[Tang Yun] Ancient double cut, Yinjiang. [Jade articles] Pork squash, fragrant scorpion.

Old glyph
茳
Name meaning
Perennial herb, the stem is triangular, the leaves degenerate into a sheath, and small green-brown flowers bloom in summer. Stems can be matted.
